name: game shmovement prototype
description:
Controls

  • WASD - Movement
  • Mouse - Aim
  • Rightclick - Dash
  • Leftclick - Shoot
  • R - Restart
  • T - Change music
  • Mousescroll - Change music volume

this is a prototype for the movement of a game i am working on.

visuals, audio, and basically everything is subject to change. 

open to ideas
